TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 780
TEI.2.document_title: James Gaines to Stephen F. Austin, 04-30-1824

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 780

div1.p: Recd. of Stephen F. Austin five Dollars for two hoes paid on Austins order being in full for the same April 30, 1824
